code: import _classCallCheck from"C:/Users/Lenovo/Desktop/project-3-master/client/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/classCallCheck";import runtimeEnv from"@mars/heroku-js-runtime-env";import axios from'axios';var env=runtimeEnv();var CourseService=function CourseService(){var _this=this;_classCallCheck(this,CourseService);this.getCourses=function(){return _this.apiHandler.get('/getAllCourses');};this.getRandomCourses=function(){return _this.apiHandler.get('/sampleCourses');};this.getTeacherCourses=function(teacherId){return _this.apiHandler.get("/getTeacherCourses/".concat(teacherId));};this.getCourse=function(courseId){return _this.apiHandler.get("/getOneCourse/".concat(courseId));};this.saveCourse=function(courseInfo){return _this.apiHandler.post("/newCourse",courseInfo);};this.editCourse=function(courseId,courseInfo){return _this.apiHandler.put("/editCourse/".concat(courseId),courseInfo);};this.deleteCourse=function(courseId){return _this.apiHandler.delete("/deleteCourse/".concat(courseId));};this.deleteTeacherCourses=function(teacherId){return _this.apiHandler.delete("/deleteTeacherCourses/".concat(teacherId));};this.apiHandler=axios.create({baseURL:"".concat(env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/courses"),withCredentials:true});};export{CourseService as default};
